name: distillogue
description: A tool for conducting dialogue in the distilled format of your choice; currently in very early development.
author: Eve Aviv Keinan

scripts.install: cd shared && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.buildDev: cd backend && start npm run buildDev && cd ../frontend && start npm run buildDev
scripts.host: cd backend && start npm run host
scripts.hostDev: cd backend && start npm run hostDev
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run host
scripts.serveDev: npm run buildDev && npm run hostDev
scripts.test: npm run serve && npm run cypress
